sentences.en: " Do not the sins of others sadden you? "
sentences.cn: “ 不其它的罪恶悲哀你 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: Although that wasn't surprising, it did sadden and even scare me.
sentences.cn: 尽管并不出乎意料, 但还是令我难过,甚至令我恐慌.

sentences.en: But I would not sadden you by the mortal plaint.
sentences.cn: 但我不愿以生命必有终结的哀叹使你悲伤.

sentences.en: Do not sadden your friends and gladden your enemies.
Do remember that you must not do things that will sadden your friends and gladden enemies.
sentences.cn: 切记你不能做出令亲者痛仇者快的事.

sentences.en: Don't sadden your friends and gladden your enemies.
I do not want to sadden you again.
sentences.cn: 我不想再次刺伤你的心.

sentences.en: I wouldn't want sadden you with anguish.
sentences.cn: 我也不想再使你难过悲伤.

sentences.en: The cruelty in the world saddens me incredibly.
sentences.cn: 世间的残酷令我悲伤不已。

sentences.en: The piers sadden when the afternoon moors there.
sentences.cn: 当暮色停泊在那处,码头伤感.

sentences.en: Those who knew him are saddened by his death.
sentences.cn: 认识他的那些人都为他的去世感到难过。

sentences.en: Undeniable: Sorrow is better than laughter, It'sadden your face, but It'sharpens your understanding.
sentences.cn: 不可否认: 伤感比大笑更有益, 虽然它让你成了苦瓜脸, 但它能磨练你的意志.

sentences.en: When you hear news from Afghanistan or Iraq, does It'sadden you?
sentences.cn: 当你听到来自阿富汗和伊朗的消息, 是不是感到悲伤?

sentences.en: You can sigh away half your youth if you choose to allow failed relationship to sadden you.
sentences.cn: 如果你陷于失败的伤感中,你就会使前半生在叹息中度过.

sentences.en: You can sigh away half your youth if you choose to allow failed relationships sadden you.
sentences.cn: 如果你想让关系不好使你伤心发愁的话,你可能会在叹息中浪费掉一半的青春.

words.tran_cn: 难过的；悲哀的，令人悲痛的；凄惨的，阴郁的（形容颜色）
